text:
A Quebec landlords association is advising landlords to act against tenants who can't pay rent due to coronavirus job loss.

They say allowing even one tenant to pay late could "degenerate rapidly" and spread among tenants, leading to a "loss of control."

https://t.co/ucNUbMvYdv
